name: Insanus Express
description: In Insanus express you will manage an express psychiatric clinic with a crazy staff! The game consists of overcoming different scenarios while trying to keep it all under control. But watch out! You can always screw up and get everyone CRAZY!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: Intel Core i3 6100 or AMD FX-4350 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT 1030, 2GB (Legacy: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460), AMD RX550, 2GB (Legacy: AMD Radeon HD 6850), Integrated: Intel HD Graphics 630 DirectX: Version 8.2 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 8.1 SP3 Processor: Intel Core i5 6600 or AMD Ryzen 1600x Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, 3 GB (Legacy: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 780, 4GB) or AMD RX 580, 4 GB (Legacy: AMD R9 290X, 4GB) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 100 MB available space
